Name: Zero spring episode 2
About the game: This game is scheduled to be free on Friday, March 15, 2019. It is a sequel to Zero spring episode 1. First you can choose to display the previous synopsis so you can enjoy it without playing the previous game. Although the previous work was FPS, it became JRPG to express the story completely from episode 2. It is rare in JRPG, Japan in the near future is the game stage. Movement / search is 3D FPS format, but battle with enemies is 2D JRPG format. When you encounter enemies in the 3D movement screen, it switches to the 2D battle screen. First you can choose English or Japanese, but the user interface will be in English. Game Features · 2DCG, completely original characters (We plan for future trading cards) · JRPG with a story line · Easy enjoyable difficulty setting · Guns and body armors actually used by Japanese Self Defense Force and others instead of sword and magic appeared · You have to think a little to solve a mystery · The element of FPS action like the previous game disappeared. How to operate recommended Change viewpoint with mouse Walking by W Decided by space key Menu screen and cancellation with control key Method of operation F4: Easy Full screen. Mouse: Change viewpoint. A,Q,W,E,D,Arrow keys: Move player,Function of select Enter,Space,Ctrl: Function of Enter key Ctrl: Function of ESC key in Menu panel and battle screen ESC:Menu panel,Cancel The leading character Aizawa who finished the hospital investigation in the previous game will start a new investigation in order to clarify the mystery of the spring water. / /
